feed.title: Missing the forest for the trees
feed.subtitle: I am writing of stuff I learn every day

entry.title: New theme added
entry.content: Still learning Eleventy, quite excited about the possibilities and simplicity. Found and applied a cool minimal Tale theme.

entry.title: First post - Hiya!
entry.content:
Hello World!

My name is Alex and this is my blog where I will write about the stuff I learn every day.
Mainly this would be about programming and IT, but who knows - maybe some music or cats are also here eventually!
I am currently learning Eleventy which is the platform for this blog (the eleventy-base-blog repo).
